During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Dance of the Shimmering Wave" [[Eula]] ({{Cryo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Blazing Riff" [[Xinyan]] ({{Pyro}}), "Juvenile Galant" [[Xingqiu]] ({{Hydro}}), and "Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean" [[Beidou]] ({{Electro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
